weapons.name: APBC-120
weapons.description:
A standard AU-made ballistic cosmic cannon produced in 2120.
Fires a solid, armor-penetrating projectile at the target. Designed for neutralizing small battleships.

weapons.name: E9-Disruptor
weapons.description:
European electric cannon first produced in 2117.
Fires a small projectile which penetrates and attaches itself to the target, then releases an electrical charge.

weapons.name: R9-Carrier
weapons.description:
European-made cannon for launching hollow projectiles at high velocities over a vaccuum.
Fires a hollow projectile desiged to penetrate armor and expose its contents on impact, modified for carrying Uranium dust.

weapons.name: Viper
weapons.description:
Custom-made, corrosive projectile cannon made of various mechanical parts.
Fires numerous small, high-temperature projectiles which corrode armor on impact.
